overview: Sabash Babu is a Tamil film released in 1993 produced by T. Rajendar and directed by Sasi Mohan. Rajender himself appears in a major role with his son, Silambarasan appearing in the title role as a child artiste. Heera Rajgopal also features, whilst the film featured an extensive cast, which also featured Rajendar's other children, along with a bevy of supporting actors. The film released in diwali 1993. The music and lyrics by T. Rajendar.
title: Sabash Babu
